name: Baha's Bigger Blaster
description: Baha's Bigger Blaster is a Legendary Gearbox shotgun from Enhanced. It is a full-auto shotgun with improved range for its class, built for sustained close-range fire.

special.red: Giving you a leg up on the competition!
special.description: The Baha's Bigger Blaster is a Full-Auto Shotgun and has increased Damage, reduced Recoil, but broader Spread. Fires as long as the trigger is held down. Increased range for a shotgun.
